title: @Meddler any updates regarding Nidalee buff?
body:
We all can see the current state of Nidalee in the game. And despite several pro players say she is OK, it is far from being true. She had lost almost all her early game advantages without any bonus for her mid-late game.

We've heard clearly about incoming 7.2 patch with Nidalee buffs.
However there is still none on PBE and it makes any Nidalee player to be confused.

Any clarification would be very appreciated. Thanks.

replies.body: Buffs should be showing up on the next PBE update. I believe that is today, will double check.
Will there be any buffs to Kindred or Rek'sai soon? They have been struggling even with the new jungle changes.
I know he's one of them, I was just concerned with Rek'sai and Kindred.

I thank you and right now we can see the buffs on PBE. However I have to admit they disappoint me.

Those buffs are all about Nidalee Utility.
E buff will help her having a healthier first clear, but it will remain very slow with all the CD and Auto resets nerfs. So the problem does not seem ti be fixed.

And the human W rework... well.. It seems very interesting, but it only helps indirectly. Probably it could help controlling enemy jungler if you are counter jungling. But in the current state due to slow first clear and weak dueling potential, it is hard to counter jungle any meta hero like Heca, Lee Sin, Vi etc.

So correct me if I'm wrong but those buffs could be pleasent for some sort of support nidalee. Not the thing junglers were expecting.
